BACKWARD_movdetectionwindowsize=3
BACKWARD_amplitudeAvgThresholdMoveToNotMove=100
BACKWARD_amplitudeStdDevThresholdMoveToNotMove=-1
BACKWARD_amplitudeAvgThresholdNotMoveToMove=-1
BACKWARD_amplitudeStdDevThresholdNotMoveToMove=-1
BACKWARD_aCount=-1
BACKWARD_pCount=3
BACKWARD_useAvg=true
BACKWARD_useStd=false

BACKWARD_amplitudeAvgThresholdMoveToNotMove_H=100
BACKWARD_amplitudeStdDevThresholdMoveToNotMove_H=-1
BACKWARD_amplitudeAvgThresholdNotMoveToMove_H=-1
